jp.go.enri.prml.vb

Class NDEParameterDistribution

  • java.lang.Object
    • jp.go.enri.prml.vb.NDEParameterDistribution

  • public class NDEParameterDistribution
extends java.lang.Object
    Prior/posterior distribution parameters of the mixture of Gaussian and Laplace distributions
    Version:
    1.0.1 (Last update: 30/11/2011)
    Author:
    Masato Fujita (Electronic Navigation Research Institute)

        Constructor
        Parameters:
        m - the number of Gaussian components in the mixture
        n - the number of Laplace components in the mixture
        alpha - the parameters of Dirichlet prior/posterior distribution of the mixing coefficients \pi ((m+n)-dimensional array)
